class DialogPreferenceStub

Detailed Description

A base class for Preference objects that are dialog-based.

These preferences will, when clicked, open a dialog showing the actual preference controls.

ref com::gaia::R::styleable::DialogPreference_dialogTitle ref com::gaia::R::styleable::DialogPreference_dialogMessage ref com::gaia::R::styleable::DialogPreference_dialogIcon ref com::gaia::R::styleable::DialogPreference_dialogLayout ref com::gaia::R::styleable::DialogPreference_positiveButtonText ref com::gaia::R::styleable::DialogPreference_negativeButtonText

virtual void gaia::ui::DialogPreference::onBindDialogWidget ( gaia::core::Widget *  widget) [protected, virtual]

Binds views in the content View of the dialog to data.

Make sure to call through to the superclass implementation.

Parameters:
viewThe content View of the dialog, if it is custom.
virtual gaia::core::Widget* gaia::ui::DialogPreference::onCreateDialogWidget ( ) [protected, virtual]

Creates the content view for the dialog (if a custom content view is required).

By default, it inflates the dialog layout resource if it is set.

Returns:
The content View for the dialog.
See also:
#setLayoutResource(int)
virtual void gaia::ui::DialogPreference::onDialogClosed ( bool  positiveResult) [protected, virtual]

Called when the dialog is dismissed and should be used to save data to the ApplicationPreferences.

Parameters:
positiveResultWhether the positive button was clicked (true), or the negative button was clicked or the dialog was canceled (false).
void gaia::ui::DialogPreference::setDialogIcon ( int32_t  dialogIconRes)

Sets the icon (resource ID) of the dialog.

This will be shown on subsequent dialogs.

Parameters:
dialogIconResThe icon, as a resource ID.
